model.mech¶

This module contains continuous-time models for mechanical subsystems.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Mechanics

This class represents the mechanical subsystem.
class model.mech.Mechanics(J=0.015, B=0, tau_L_ext=Step(0.8, 14.6))¶

This class represents the mechanical subsystem.

f(self, t, w_M, tau_M)¶

Computes the state derivative.

Parameters:

  • t (float) – Time.

  • w_M (float) – Rotor speed (in mechanical rad/s).

  • tau_M (float) – Electromagnetic torque.

Returns:

Time derivative of the state vector.

Return type:

list, length 2

meas_speed(self)¶
Returns:

w_M0 – Rotor speed (in mechanical rad/s) at the end of the integration period.

Return type:

float

meas_position(self)¶
Returns:

theta_M0 – Rotor angle (in mechanical rad) at the end of the integration period.

Return type:

float

__str__(self)¶

Return str(self).

motulator
